title: Community Banking
content: For release on delivery   9:00 a.m. EST   February 16, 2012         Community Banking        Remarks by    Ben S. Bernanke    Chairman    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at    “The Future of Community Banking”    A Conference Sponsored by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation    Arlington, Virginia      February 16, 2012
